price: Оё он ки меофаринад, ҳамчун касе аст, ки [ҳеҷ] намеофаринад? Оё панд намегиред?
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna
